body:
~~Code review ACK 1211a90132eff1e796f248fff79d9e3d386f85e9~~
Code review re-ACK ccb7b6a97652b45f60e0ac680a239bc6058b9773
If this passes on RISC-V and all other platforms, it can be merged.
I had to add a change to move the security check tests from a CI using Bionic, to one using Focal. This is also being done as a part of #21135.
